name: Beijing Taxi Limited Edition HOME DVD Signed by the Director (Not For Educational Use)
description:
NOTE: For CONSUMER/HOME/PERSONAL Use Only. For EDUCATIONAL use select the EDUCATIONAL LICENSED DVD option.
"Poignant... Seamless"
– The New York Times

"Mesmerizing"
– **Critics’ Pick** New York Magazine

"Engrossing... Imagistic ... Revealing"
– Variety

Get your copy of the signed limited-edition first printing of Beijing Taxi! There are lots of DVD extras included on the beautifully designed disk. Content includes: + Main Feature + Chapters + Extras Extra Features Include: * Trailer * Yao Yao (A 2:30 minute short video portrait of a little boy from the Beijing Taxi out takes.) * Flipbooks (A 2:00 minute short video of limited-edition flipbooks made from Beijing Taxi film stills) * Film Stills (A slideshow of high resolution stills taken during the production of Beijing Taxi) * Production Stills (A slideshow of high resolution production stills taken during the production of Beijing Taxi)

name: Beijing Taxi Deluxe (Home DVD + Tshirt + Soundtrack) GREAT GIFT PACKAGE!
description:
This deluxe discounted bundle includes a copy of the limited edition PERSONAL/HOME use DVD, an official Beijing Taxi tshirt, and the motion picture soundtrack album. 

NOTE: DVD is for CONSUMER/HOME/PERSONAL Use Only. For EDUCATIONAL use select the EDUCATIONAL LICENSED DVD option.

Get your copy of the signed limited-edition first printing of Beijing Taxi! 
There are lots of DVD extras included on the beautifully designed disk.
Content includes:
+ Main Feature
+ Chapters
+ Extras 

Extra Features Include:
* Trailer
* Yao Yao (A 2:30 minute short video portrait of a little boy from the Beijing Taxi out takes.)
* Flipbooks (A 2:00 minute short video of limited-edition flipbooks made from Beijing Taxi film stills)
* Film Stills (A slideshow of high resolution stills taken during the production of Beijing Taxi)
* Production Stills (A slideshow of high resolution production stills taken during the production of Beijing Taxi)

Motion Picture Soundtrack:
Original Score: Stephen Ulrich and Itamar Ziegler 
Soundtrack featuring Beijing Recording Artists:
Sand 沙子乐队, Sound Fragment 声音碎片, Miserable Faith 痛仰

name: Beijing Taxi Motion Picture Soundtrack
description:
Original Score: Stephen Ulrich and Itamar Ziegler 
Soundtrack featuring Beijing Recording Artists:
Sand 沙子乐队, Sound Fragment 声音碎片, Miserable Faith 痛仰

name: Beijing Taxi Official T-shirt
description:
This is the official Beijing Taxi T-shirt! Comes in gray/silver. 

It's so soft you will not want to take your hands off it!

Women's tshirt brand is Alternative Apparel.
Men's tshirt brand is Next Level.

Tshirt Design by Laurence Martin.

name: Beijing Taxi EDUCATIONAL LICENSE DVD
description:
NOTE: EDUCATIONAL LICENSE DVDs are for use by colleges, universities, libraries, museums, corporations, and other institutions. Contact us at edu@threewatersproductions.com for Purchase Orders, Credit Card orders, and order by check.
"★★★½ HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. Gets to the soul of contemporary urban China... A revealing and deeply human look at the society behind the headlines of an emerging superpower."

– M. Sandlin, Video Librarian
"Poignant... Seamless"
– The New York Times

"Mesmerizing"
– **Critics’ Pick** New York Magazine

"Engrossing... Imagistic ... Revealing"
– Variety

DVD extras included on the beautifully designed disk. Content includes: + Main Feature + Chapters + Extras Extra Features Include: * Trailer * Yao Yao (A 2:30 minute short video portrait of a little boy from the Beijing Taxi out takes.) * Flipbooks (A 2:00 minute short video of limited-edition flipbooks made from Beijing Taxi film stills) * Film Stills (A slideshow of high resolution stills taken during the production of Beijing Taxi) * Production Stills (A slideshow of high resolution production stills taken during the production of Beijing Taxi)

name: Beijing Taxi Theatrical Movie Poster 27x39"
description:
We have a limited-edition of 27x39" official theatrical Beijing Taxi movie posters for your collection, signed by the director. 
Design by Laurence Martin.

name: Beijing Taxi Limited Edition Flipbooks - Unique, Signed, Numbered, Hand-made
description: We created 60 one-of-a-kind flipbooks from film stills from Beijing Taxi. Each one of these flipbooks are unique, signed, numbered, and made with love by hand!Most of these objet d'art are now in the hands of those who made a donation to help Beijing Taxi happen. There are only a few left in our possession. You can preview in the video documentation which one you would like by clicking on the numbers below, and selecting the corresponding number in the drop down box. No 1-0017 No 1-0018 No 1-0021 No 1-0026 No 1-0032 No 1-0037 No 1-0038 No 1-0042
